Package com.skobbler.ngx.map

Constains classses needed to show the map and information on the map.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
SKMapSurfaceListener Listener for map surface events.
 

Class Summary
SKAnimationSettings Stores information about the annotation animation settings.
SKAnnotation Stores information about an annotation
SKAnnotationText Class that specifies the text (as well as the text attributes) that can be rendered with an annotation.
SKAnnotationView Class that specifies the source of a bitmap to be rendered with an annotation.
SKBoundingBox Stores information about a bounding box.
SKCalloutView callout view that can be used to display information about points on the map.
SKCircle Stores information related to a circle.
SKCoordinateRegion Class that stores information about a map region ( map center and zoom level).
SKMapCustomPOI Class used as input parameter to add a custom POI on the map.
SKMapInternationalizationSettings SKMapInternationalizationSettings stores information about the maps labeling language.
SKMapPOI Stores information about a map POI.
SKMapScaleView SKMapView's scale view.
SKMapSettings Defines settings for the map view.
SKMapSurfaceView Class that constructs a map surface view.
SKMapViewHolder Class that holds the map surface view and other helper views.
SKMapViewStyle Model object for a map style, defined by resources folder and json file.
SKPOICluster Stores information about the selected POI cluster.
SKPOIData Contains the attributes defining a place type.
SKPolygon Stores information related to a polygon.
SKPolyline Stores information related to a polyline.
SKPulseAnimationSettings Stores the pulse animation settings.
SKScreenPoint Stores information about a screen point.
 

Enum Summary
SKAnimationSettings.SKAnimationType The type of animation for the poi.
SKAnimationSettings.SKEasingType Types of easing curves (study http://easings.net/ or related literature for more details)
SKMapCustomPOI.SKPoiType Type of custom poi.
SKMapSettings.SKMapDisplayMode Map display mode
SKMapSettings.SKMapFollowerMode Map follower mode
SKMapSurfaceView.SKAnimationNotificationType  
SKMapSurfaceView.SKAnimationType  
SKMapSurfaceView.SKDrawingOrder  
SKMapSurfaceView.SKOrientationIndicatorType SKOrientationIndicatorType triangle types.
SKMapSurfaceView.SKOrientationType Specifies types of orientation for the phone.
 

Package com.skobbler.ngx.map Description

Constains classses needed to show the map and information on the map.
